document.full_text: lehman brothers holdings inc  on wednesday agreed to put creditors' competing restructuring plans on the same timeline for court approval as its own plan, but reserved the right to raise future objections.
document.title: lehman, creditors agree on plan approval timeline
lines_and_colors: lehman brothers holdings inc  on wednesday agreed to put creditors' competing restructuring plans on the same timeline for court approval as its own plan, but reserved the right to raise future objections.
